issue.title: Google Search Console API O-Auth from Settings
issue.body:
it should be possible to access the 

Google Search Console API (https://developers.google.com/apis-explorer/#p/webmasters/v3/ ) 
Google Analytics API (https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/reporting/core/v4/ ) 

from the rules

for this we need  an OAuth 2 Token
GSC: https://developers.google.com/webmaster-tools/search-console-api-original/v3/how-tos/authorizing
GA: https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/reporting/core/v4/authorization
(read only access it enough)


on the "Settings" Section it should be able to start the authentiaction. the OAuth Verification Section should before the rules.

in the context of the rules the oauth token shoud be available as someting like

context.tokens.google_search_console
context.tokens.google_analytics

------------

please implement some sample rules that show the access to these APIs 

-----------

(in the application the code should be implmented in a way that it is relatively easy to add other oauth verifcation pathns in the future ) 

---------------------------

issue.title: Remove chrome.loadTimes() and replace with standardized APIs
issue.body:
We should remove `chrome.loadTimes()` since its deprecated and throws extension warnings:

![screenshot 2019-03-01 11 05 49](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/238180/53631251-6ac6c480-3c12-11e9-8d3c-918b629456c8.png)

What todo:

- [ ] Replace the usage of `loadTimes` in all rules with standardized APIs (https://developers.google.com/web/updates/2017/12/chrome-loadtimes-deprecated)
- [ ] Remove `chrome.loadTimes()` from the core https://github.com/franzenzenhofer/f19n-obtrusive-livetest/blob/f6a9dc0cc65848030a06537224c0c26888634e53/src/javascripts/document_idle.js#L1

issue.title: Google Page Speed Api Key Global Variable
issue.body:
on the settings page there should be a section


Globale Variables
 * Google Page Speed Insights Key: [                     ] (input form)
 * Google Mobile Friendly Test Key: [                      ] (input form)
 * Rate Limited Domains: [                          ] (input form)

these global varialbes should be available in the context of the rules as varialbes

small icons are missing

IS:
